message.content:
cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.LO, cs.SY, cs.DM

Reasoning: The paper deals with subshifts and cellular automata, which are topics in discrete dynamical systems (cs.DS). It also involves the concept of measures, which is related to information theory (cs.IT). The paper also discusses the construction of subshifts, which is a topic in logic and computation (cs.LO). The use of cellular automata to realize subshifts can also be seen as a control and systems engineering problem (cs.SY). Finally, the paper involves the study of probabilities and patterns, which are topics in discrete mathematics (cs.DM).
